pages.text: Casting is a key mechanic to activate abilities, specially the caster ones. To cast you need to use a focus like staffs, lanternflails or branch specific items.

pages.title: Activation
pages.text: You can activate your abilities with: $(list1)$(l)$(k:ancientclasses.ability1)$() $(list1)$(l)$(k:ancientclasses.ability2)$() $(list1)$(l)$(k:ancientclasses.ability3)$() $(list1)$(l)$(k:ancientclasses.ability4)$() $(list1)$(l)$(k:ancientclasses.passive)$() $(br2)This is not written in stone, as you can customize it.$()

pages.title: Spell Invocation
pages.text: To invocate a spell, follow this steps: $(list1)Press $(l)$(k:use)$() with a focus item in your main hand. $(list1)Activate the ability of your choice. $() $(list1)Then hold both until the spell is invocated, then release any key$()
